turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We are going to do pizza from Gionino's for dinner tonight can you place the order for us?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, the Gionino's in Hudson?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please I want to pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely. What can I get for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a white pizza and a hawaiian pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok great what sizes?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium. I think they have a special tonight, 2 medium pizzas for 16.95.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They do have that special but it is for one topping pizzas not specialty pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh dang it. Ok well I guess since their is no special price lets just go large on both of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, one large Hawaiian and one large white pizza.That is 48 dollars.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok. Sounds good. Actually can you add a small garden pizza I just realized one of my guests is vegeterian.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes that is another 10 dollars. So the total will be 58 dollars. One small veggie pizza, a large hawaiian and a large white pizza. For pickup. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Maybe a 2 liter of pepsi?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They actually only have coke products.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok coke is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok that is 2.75 a bottle. Just one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, let's get two.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright that makes your grand total 64 dollars.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright your large hawaiian, large white pizza, small veggie pizza and two two liters of coke will be 64 dollars should take about 25 minutes for pickup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fantastic thank you so much. You can swing by and have a slice if you are out and about.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh I just ate but thank you and enjoy your dinner. I will see you tomorrow.
